name: The Mystery Vault
description:
"The Mystery vault"  is a game where player needs to escape from a weird vault.

 Here he needs to collect some normal keys and a special key. He will spawn in a platform where after every 2 seconds he will fall into a nightmare where he has to survive from enemy's and after collecting all normal keys he has to eliminated the final boss to get the special key which can lead him out of that weird vault. The quick you get all the keys, the quick you escape from nightmare. 

Inputs:

Normal world:

  • A, D = left, right movement
  • space bar = jump

chaotic world:

  • W, A, S, D = movement
  • left mouse click = shoot

Be aware: In normal world, player has only 1 life. It may feel too punishing. But it wouldn't be chaotic without it. Savvy?  😁

Jokes apart, Happy playing :D
